mapper.select: SELECT /* SMDBTmncsMapper.selectTmncsDtl */ TMNCS_SEQ , CNTN , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_IP , REG_DTM , MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME , MOD_IP , MOD_DTM FROM SM_TMNCS_MST A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY TMNCS_SEQ desc LIMIT 1;
SELECT /* SMDBTmncsMapper.selectSeqNum */ NEXT_ID FROM CO_SEQ_MST WHERE TABLE_NM = #{tableNm}
mapper.update: UPDATE CO_SEQ_MST /*SMDBTmncsMapper.updateTmncsSeq*/ SET NEXT_ID = (SELECT * FROM (SELECT NEXT_ID + '1' FROM CO_SEQ_MST WHERE TABLE_NM = #{tableNm}) tmp) WHERE TABLE_NM = #{tableNm}
